about_the_game:
WELCOME TO HIGHRISE – YOUR VIRTUAL HOME ON THE INTERNET

Step into Highrise, the ultimate social playground where you can connect, play, and express your digital self. Whether you're here to make new friends, build amazing spaces, or show off your unique style, you'll be joining a thriving community of over 50 million people exploring a world of endless possibilities.

CONNECT THROUGH PLAY

  • Immerse yourself in a vibrant online universe with millions of users.

  • Instantly join thousands of interactive rooms for gaming, casual chats, or unforgettable events.

  • Chat in real-time via messages or voice and forge meaningful connections.

  • Compete in weekly events to win exclusive outfits and rewards.

  • Enjoy a safe and welcoming environment, supported by our world-class moderation team.

EXPRESS YOURSELF, YOUR WAY

  • Design a one-of-a-kind avatar that reflects your personality and style.

  • Customize your profile with a unique background, bio, and favorite items showcase.

  • Share your thoughts, experiences, and creativity through text, images, or videos on the Feed.

  • Bring your artistic vision to life by designing new items in community contests.

  • Build and decorate virtual rooms to create the perfect hangout for you and your friends.

FOR THE COLLECTORS & TRADERS

  • Discover a treasure trove of 50,000+ collectible items, with fresh drops every week.

  • Buy, sell, and trade in the player-run marketplace to level up your outfit and earn profits.

  • Spot an outfit you love? Inspect, trade, and negotiate directly from the Inbox.

  • Keep track of must-have items with your personal Wishlist.

  • Use advanced filters and categories to find exactly what you're looking for in seconds.

Your Highrise adventure starts now. Step into a world where creativity knows no limits and every interaction is a new possibility. Are you ready? 🚀

Step into Highrise, the ultimate social playground where you can connect, play, and express your digital self. Whether you're here to make new friends, build amazing spaces, or show off your unique style, you'll be joining a thriving community of over 50 million people exploring a world of endless possibilities.

EXPRESS YOURSELF, YOUR WAY

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 11 (Big Sur) or above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

name: Highrise

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer (x64 versions only).
  • Processor: Intel, AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Highrise is your virtual home, where over 50 million users connect, play, and express their digital selves. Create a unique avatar, design custom spaces, and join vibrant communities for gaming, chatting, and events. With creativity, and a thriving community, Highrise offers endless possibilities.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Arabic*, Dutch*, Indonesian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Spanish - Latin America*, Turkish*
*languages with full audio support
